## TemplateProps.pathOverride property

Set in the preview context of the generatepagecontent API endpoint. Since the preview domain is different (occurs in the context of a serverless function) the relativePrefixToRoot needs to be updated.

**Signature:**

```typescript
pathOverride?: string;
```
